section.title: Description
section.paragraph: This element is a container for output settings involving the /names list.
This element is optional and may appear only once per scheme.

attributes.attribute: The number of names per line of output.

section.title: Data
section.paragraph: This element contains no textual data.

section.title: Engine Requirements
section.paragraph: The engine should take the value of "perLine" and store it for use when within a names listing.
